meanings.definition: Toward the head or anterior end of the body.
meanings.sent1: The bird flew cephald the tree.

meanings.definition: In a direction toward the head or anterior end.

meanings.sent2: The doctor instructed the patient to tilt their head cephald during the examination.

meanings.sent4: Her thoughts raced cephald, eager to solve the mystery.
